testcase.name: test_vehicle_segment_link_status_endpoint
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_p79_category_hierarchy.py:223: in test_vehicle_segment_link_status_endpoint assert response.status_code == 200, f"Vehicle segment link status failed: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Vehicle segment link status failed: {"detail":{"error_code":"VEHICLE_SEGMENT_NOT_FOUND","message":"Girilen segment master data’da bulunamadı."}} E assert 400 == 200 E + where 400 = <Response [400]>.status_code
